scene.name: Mouse pad manipulation setup
scene.description: A desk surface with a large flexible mouse pad

task.name: Roll and unroll mouse pad
task.description: First roll the mouse pad into a cylinder, then unroll it back to a flat state
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will practice rolling and unrolling the mouse pad. First, roll it up, and then spread it back out.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要练习卷起和展开鼠标垫。首先把它卷起来，然后再把它铺平展开。

subtasks.description: Execute the rolling and unrolling sequence
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Please follow the steps to roll and then unroll the pad.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：请按照步骤卷起并展开鼠标垫。

steps.description: Roll up the mouse pad from one edge
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: roll up the mouse pad.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一步：将鼠标垫卷起来。

steps.description: Unroll the mouse pad back to flat
steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: unroll the mouse pad.

constraints.notes: Ensure the mouse pad is rolled tightly in step one and fully flattened in step two.
